definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提貨單是國際貿易和船運中一種很重要的單據。

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式爲憑單據以不可撤消的信用證向髮卡行議付。

sentences.english: Documents must be presented for negotiation within 10 days after shipment date.
sentences.chinese: 單據須正在拆船後10天內提示議付。

sentences.english: You need all your receipts for reimbursement.
sentences.chinese: 你需要上交所有要報銷的單據。

sentences.english: We'll need you to sign a credit card voucher in advance.
sentences.chinese: 你們需要提前籤一下信用卡的單據。

sentences.english: We also certify that the quantities as specified in our shipping documents are correct。
sentences.chinese: 我們還保證列在運輸單據貨物清單中的數量是正確的。

sentences.english: The law enforcement officer searched a proptosis there and then illegal line operation of movement of goods document.
sentences.chinese: 執法人員當場搜出了非法生產經營以來的運貨單據。

sentences.english: RUBBER STAMP SIGNATURES OF THE BENEFICIARY ON DOCUMENTS ARE NOT ACCEPTABLE。
sentences.chinese: 蓋有受益人橡皮圖章的單據將不予接受。

sentences.english: An air transport document must indicate that the goods have been accepted for carriage.
sentences.chinese: 空運單據必須表明貨物已收妥待運。

sentences.english: Documents listed in a credit should be presented as separate documents.
sentences.chinese: 信用證列明的單據應作爲單獨單據提交。

sentences.english: Documents listed in a credit should be presented as separate documents.
sentences.chinese: 信用證列明的單據應作爲單獨單據提交。

sentences.english: Every shipment must be accompanied by a number of correct documents.
sentences.chinese: 發出的每一票貨都必須有正確的單據。

sentences.english: All documents except Bill of Lading should show this L/C number and date。
sentences.chinese: 除了提單外的所有單據都須顯示信用證號碼和日期。

sentences.english: The documents shall be held by the issuing bank at the disposal of the seller.
sentences.chinese: 開證行應掌握單據，由賣方全權處理。

sentences.english: Eg. He paused a moment to flick through the books and papers, then went on.
sentences.chinese: 他頓了一頓，翻着那些單據和表冊，又接下去說下去。

sentences.english: A receipt of the things requisitioned shall be made out.
sentences.chinese: 實施徵用應當開具徵用單據。

definition: paper money/a bill (e.g. 100 yuan)/CL:張|张[zhang1],紮|扎[za1]
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
